decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers / patients outside the following times:-

0900 hours to 1900 hours, Monday to Friday inclusive; 0900 hours to 1900 hours on Saturdays; and 1000 hours to 1700 on Sundays or Bank Holidays, without the prior written permission of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents, thereby according with Planning Policy Guidance 24: Noise 1994, policy 7.15.B of The London Plan 2011 and saved policy EP25 of the Harrow Unitary Development Plan 2004.
Condition : 2 - The planning permission hereby granted is supplemental to planning permission ref: P/2919/10 dated 30/03/2011/ Save as modified by this permission the terms and conditions of the original permission are hereby ratified and remain in full force and effect unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: VARIATION OF CONDITION 3 ATTACHED TO PLANNING PERMISSION P/2919/10 DATED 30/03/2011 TO PERMIT THE OPENING HOURS TO 0900 HOURS TO 1900 HOURS, MONDAY TO FRIDAY INCLUSIVE, 0900 HOURS TO 1900 HOURS ON SATURDAYS, AND 10:00 HOURS TO 17:00 HOURS ON SUNDAYS OR BANK HOLIDAYS
